name: Journal.Update
remarks: Sets the specified quest to the specified stage number (as preconfigured in the Journal asset), and updates the journal list. If the quest was not yet in the player's journal, it will be added.

input.name: quest
input.desc: the asset name of the Journal to update

input.name: stage
input.desc: the stage number to set this Journal to

name: Journal.Close
remarks: Removes a quest from the player's journal.

input.name: quest
input.desc: the asset name of the Journal to remove
